Version 0.1
  -Has camera
  -Contains Dive ability
  -Fishing Boat Enemies
  -Fishing Boats die on contact

Version 0.2
  -zoom functionality
  -new enemies
  -planets
  -starry background

Version 0.3
  -Two New Bosses
	-Kraken
		a. An octopus boss that covers the screen and chases you
	-Galleon
		a. A pirate ship with multiple weapons that runs away from you

  -Multiple new enemies
  -Lasers
  -4 new Player Special Abilities
  -Removed Dive Ability
  -Collectible power ups
  -health packs
  -armour Bar
  -armour pickups
